Uses of EximResourceConfig in com.smartitengineering.exim
 

Methods in com.smartitengineering.exim that return EximResourceConfig
static EximResourceConfig ConfigRegistrar.getConfigForClass(java.lang.Class resourceClass)
          Scans (if required) and return the configuration for the resource class
 EximResourceConfig ClassConfigScanner.getResourceConfigForClass(java.lang.Class resourceClass)
          Retrieves the configuration for the resource class, if its not already generated then it will search the package of the class and generate its configuraiton.
 

Methods in com.smartitengineering.exim that return types with arguments of type EximResourceConfig
static java.util.Collection<EximResourceConfig> ConfigRegistrar.getConfigForPackage(java.lang.Package resourcePackage)
          Return all configurations from a package and in process if requried also initiate a scan process
 java.util.Map<java.lang.Class,EximResourceConfig> ConfigScanner.getConfigurations()
          Return all configurations scanned till now

          This implementation represents the configuration of a class.

protected  EximResourceConfig DefaultAnnotationConfigScanner.scanClassForConfig(java.lang.Class probableResourceClass)
